A reminder that school begins for all students (in all learning modes) on Tuesday, September 8. Individual school schedules have been communicated by buildings.
Next, if your child(ren) is/are NOT planning to return to live, face to face instruction and you have not signed up for either Distance Learning or the Tecumseh Virtual Academy, you need to call your child's school directly as soon as possible to do so!
Lastly, we would like to announce the Chromebook handout schedule for all students (Y5-12) who will either be in the Distance Learning program or in the TVA and do not already have a device. Again, this handout is ONLY for Distance Learning and TVA students who require a school provided computer device.
Pick up will be available this Thursday, September 3 at THS from 8-10am, 1-3pm and 4-6pm. If one of these times does not work out, please communicate with your child's school. Please bring a pre-filled out card with each child and grade level listed.
More information about our school start up will be coming out this week!

Thanks!

Rick Hilderley
Superintendent

Go to www.tps.k12.mi.us. Click on the Summer School Sign UP box.

Classes are scheduled online Monday through Thursday and run June 15 through August 14, 2020. It's FREE for TPS families!

Classes are offered for middle school and high school students interested in getting ahead with credit forward or catching up with credit recovery through Edmentum software.

In these times we have seen people putting it all on the line and we want to show appreciation with your help. Our local Hospital Staff, Ambulance Services, Fire Departments, Police Departments, Postal Workers, School Food Service and Bus Drivers are going above and beyond for our local and area communities. Our goal is to bring in donations to purchase lunch, dinner, and things in need for these brave men and women. This endeavor will be two fold: appreciation for those putting their lives on the line and supporting restaurants by purchasing meals locally. Show your appreciation today by donating at https://checkout.square.site/pay/e57061fcd12f47c49002b7c70e42f945 Thank You All!

No Donation is too small and any value is accepted! For every $20 or more you will be entered into a drawing on June 18 for a La-Z-Boy recliner donated by Martin's Home Center.

BOX 🎁 SOCIAL!
TPS Art Students, Cambrian Seniors & Judge Schaedler!

Senior residents at Cambrian brought their “bucks” and had a chance to spend it at a live auction! The event was sponsored by TPS art students. Students crafted, and embellished, ￼beautiful art boxes, then filled them with goodies, to￼ mimic a Box social.

Residents at Cambrian earn Gareth bucks (play money), when they participate in activities at Cambrian. The bucks are named after one of the owners, Gareth Zebley. During this event they used the bucks at a live auction!
